details.description:
Gain 60 Power When Health above 90%
+10% Experience from Kills

name: Leystone Coat Box
description: Double-click to choose a piece of light, medium, or heavy armor.

name: Weighted Daysword Blade
description: This item only has value as part of a collection.

name: Recipe: Tizlak's Flanged Mace
description: A recipe to make an ascended mace with Commander's (+Power, +Precision, +Toughness, and +Concentration) stats.

name: Glob of Blue Ooze
description: Bits of ooze dropped by blue-colored ooze.

name: Essence of Illumination
description: Use this essence of craft a completed precursor.

name: Machined Longbow String
description: This item only has value as part of a collection.

name: Adventurous Melody
description: This item only has value as part of a collection.

name: Capacitive Bottle
description: Double-click to prime the bottle for capturing an electric charge.

name: Recipe: Morbach's Leather Breather
description: A recipe to make an ascended medium breather with Dire (+Condition Damage, +Vitality, and +Toughness) stats.

name: Bladed Glove Box
description: This armor box contains unique armor skins, dragonite ore, empyreal fragments, obsidian shards, and mystic clovers.

name: Recipe: Yassith's Striders
description: A recipe to make ascended medium boots with Viper's (+Condition Damage, +Power, +Expertise, and +Precision) stats.

name: Airship-Grade Shield Gear
description: This item only has value as part of a collection.

name: Slimemold
description: Double-click to combine a Sulfuric Egg, Slimemold, Crystallized Chaos, and Naphthenic Acid in an Empty Hylek Flask to create the Concentrated Volatile Substance.

name: Spirit of the Perfected Short Bow
description: Salvaged from the Perfected Short Bow. Used to craft The Lover.

name: Bag of Crystalline Energy
description: Used in crafting WvW guild upgrades.

name: Karka Helm Skin
description: Double-click to imbue another headgear item's stats with this appearance (one-time ability).

name: Basic Mithril Hammer
description: This item only has value as part of a collection.

name: Jungle Phoenix Finisher Box
description: This jungle phoenix finisher box contains the jungle phoenix finisher, dragonite ore, empyreal fragments, obsidian shards, and mystic clovers.

name: Icy Core
description: Use the heat from the Heart of the Destroyer in Mount Maelstrom to fuse 10 Bloodstone Dust with an Icy Core to form Gelid Paste.

name: Champion Sleepy the Black Bear Loot Box
description: This champion container has champion bags, dragonite ore, and empyreal fragments.

name: Itlaocol's Flower
description: <c=@flavor>A small and delicate white flower.<c>

name: Letter to Dessa
description: You should return this letter to Dessa.

name: Machined Pistol Frame
description: This item only has value as part of a collection.

name: Indigo Mushroom Milkshake

details.description:
66% Chance to Steal Life on Critical
+70 Precision
+10% Experience from Kills

description: <c=@flavor>Sweet, with earthy undertones.<c>

name: Fine Book Cover
description: Used to make books.

name: Machined Shield Backing
description: This item only has value as part of a collection.

name: Oiled Gossamer Coat Lining
description: Used to craft Gossamer Coats.

name: Recipe: Maklain's Short Bow
description: A recipe to make an ascended short bow with Minstrel's (+Toughness, +Healing, +Concentration, and +Vitality) stats.

name: Oiled Orichalcum Horn
description: Used to craft Warhorns.

name: Gift of Tarir
description: In the Mystic Forge, combine a Gift of the Fleet, a Gift of Tarir, a Gift of the Chak, and a Gift of the Jungle to create a Gift of Maguuma, used in crafting legendary weapons.

name: Recipe: Ruka's Wristguards
description: A recipe to make ascended light gloves with Wanderer's (+Power, +Vitality, +Concentration, and +Toughness) stats.

name: Recipe: Viper's Pearl Carver
description: A recipe to make a Viper's Pearl Carver.

name: Revenant's Cache
description: Rewarded for map completion on a Magus Falls map with a revenant.

name: Spirit of the Perfected Axe
description: Salvaged from the Perfected Axe. Used to craft Tooth of Frostfang.

name: Essence of Heroes
description: Use this essence of craft a completed precursor.

name: Recipe: Vial of Healing Breath
description: Double-click to learn this recipe.

name: Weighted Mace Head
description: This item only has value as part of a collection.

name: Recipe: Laranthir's Greaves
description: A recipe to make ascended heavy boots with Vigilant (+Power, +Toughness, +Concentration, and +Expertise) stats.

name: The Moot Vol. 3
description: This item only has value as part of a collection.

name: Ball of Dark Energy
description: Salvaged from ascended gear. Use Stabilizing Matrices to create Cubes of Stabilized Dark Energy, used to build the legendary backpack Ad Infinitum.

name: Yellow Color Study
description: This item only has value as part of a collection.

name: Recipe: Wanderer's Pearl Carver
description: A recipe to make a Wanderer's Pearl Carver.

name: Recipe: Trailblazer's Emblazoned Boots
description: A recipe to make Trailblazer's Emblazoned Boots.

name: Major Sigil of Concentration

buff.description:
Boons you apply last 33% longer for 5 seconds when you swap to this weapon while in combat.
(Cooldown: 9 Seconds)

description: Double-click to apply to a weapon.

name: Thorned Bag
description: Double-click to open.

name: Recipe: Exalted Focus Core
description: Used to craft Auric weapons.

name: Tricks and Tips for Legendary Mace Crafting
description: Contains the book "Expertise in Mace Crafting" and recipes for second-tier The Energizer.

name: Recipe: Ossa's Harpoon Gun
description: A recipe to make an ascended harpoon gun with Crusader (+Power, +Toughness, +Ferocity, and +Healing) stats.

name: Royal Chak Ichor
description: Double-click to combine the Common Chak Ichor, Royal Wasp Ichor, Branded Devourer Ichor, and Royal Chak Ichor in an Empty Hylek Flask to create the Ichor Alkahest.

name: Stolen Exalted Research Notes
description: Defeat champions at Northwatch.

name: Recipe: Trailblazer's Exalted Coat
description: A recipe to make a Trailblazer's Exalted Coat.

name: Pumpkin Seeds
description: Plant these seeds in your hidden garden in Mount Maelstrom.

name: Incinerator Vol. 3
description: This item only has value as part of a collection.

name: Tiny Translucent Ooze
description: <c=@flavor>A tiny, friendly ooze just looking for a home.<c>

name: Superior Sigil of Agility

buff.description:
Gain 5 seconds of swiftness and 1 second of quickness when you swap to this weapon while in combat.
(Cooldown: 9 Seconds)

description: Double-click to apply to a weapon.

name: Rough Book Cover
description: Used to make books.

name: Ever-Burning Ember
description: Use the cold environment near the Frost Portal at Drakkar Spurs in Frostgorge Sound to prevent an explosion while mixing an Ever-Burning Ember with 10 Bloodstone Dust to form Blasting Powder.

name: Chest of Sharks
description: Contains the Essence of Sharks and recipes for first-tier Carcharias.

name: Glittering Focus Skin
description: Double-click to apply this look to any other focus.

name: Cereboth Falls Water Sample
description: This item only has value as part of a collection.

name: Recipe: Commander's Emblazoned Coat
description: A recipe to make a Commander's Emblazoned Coat.

name: Engineer's Cache
description: Rewarded for map completion on a Magus Falls map with an engineer.

name: Mire Sea Talisman
description: This item only has value as part of a collection.

name: Box of Recipes: Howl
description: Unlocks all recipes needed to craft Howl.

name: Lump of Beeswax
description: Purchase from Fiona Hastings in the apiary near Claypool in Queensdale after successfully defending her beehives from hungry bears.

name: Festive Transom
description: Used to craft arch decorations. Found in festival reward containers.

name: Taste of Instant World Experience
description: Grants 5,000 world experience.

name: Saurian Cache
description:
Double-click to open.
Contains loot from creatures.
<c=@reminder>Affected by magic-find bonuses.</c>

name: Icy Dragon Scale
description: Sold by Rojan the Penitent in Frostgorge Sound.

name: Auric Dagger Shielding
description: This item only has value as part of a collection.

name: Recipe: Bowl of Lemongrass Mussel Pasta
Proof: Unbound
description: Contains recipes and components for crafting the backpack Unbound.

name: Endless Mushroom Queen Tonic
description: Double-click to transform for 15 minutes. You will be unable to fight while transformed.

name: Pahua's Weapon Recipe Book
description: Double-click to choose a recipe for crafting gear with the Trailblazer's stat combination.

name: Shadow Assassin Nika
description: Consume to unlock this unique Mist Champion skin on your account.

name: Jormag's Magic
description: Double-click to combine the four elder dragons' magics into the Magic of the Elder Dragons.

name: Basic Basket
description: Purchase to deposit this decoration into guild storage.

name: Tricks and Tips for Advanced Nightsword Crafting
description: Contains the book "Expertise in Nightsword Crafting" and recipes for second-tier Dusk.

name: Hylek Dart Poison Gland
description: <c=@flavor>The Morgatl hylek harvest these glands to coat their darts in its poison.<c>

name: Steel Chisel
description: Used to refine decorations.

name: Medium Thorned Bag
description: Double-click to open.

name: Gendarran Living Ice
description: This item only has value as part of a collection.

name: Mastery Point
description: Earn a Mastery point the first time you reach this tier.

name: Chest of Burning
description: Contains the Essence of Burning and recipes for completing Rodgort's Flame.

name: Tricks and Tips for Advanced Daysword Crafting
description: Contains the book "Expertise in Daysword Crafting" and recipes for second-tier Dawn.

name: Airship-Grade Sword Gear
description: This item only has value as part of a collection.

name: Molten Boss Timed Mote
description: Complete the Molten Boss timed challenge (scale 20)! Beat the boss in under five minutes!

name: Veteran Chest of the Mists
description: Double-click to open. Contains a Pristine Fractal Relic, 5 +1 Agony Infusions, a Tome of Knowledge, 2 Fractal Encryption Keys, and a Stabilizing Matrix.

name: Oiled Orichalcum Pauldron Lining
description: Used to craft Orichalcum Shoulders.

name: Recipe: Leftpaw's Cloth Breather
description: A recipe to make an ascended light breather with Settler (+Toughness, +Healing Power, and +Condition Damage) stats.

name: Mini Husk-o-Lantern
description: Double-click to summon this miniature to follow you around. Only one miniature may be in use at a time.

name: Recipe: Freshwater Pearl Orichalcum Earring
description: A recipe to make a Freshwater Pearl Orichalcum Earring.

name: Bottle of Conductosphere Essence
description: This item only has value as part of a collection.

name: Recipe: Laranthir's Wand
description: A recipe to make an ascended scepter with Vigilant (+Power, +Toughness, +Concentration, and +Expertise) stats.

name: Spirit of the Rodgort's Flame Experiment
description: Salvaged from the Rodgort's Flame Experiment. Used to craft the Perfected Torch.

name: Recipe: Wanderer's Draconic Boots
description: A recipe to make Wanderer's Draconic Boots.

name: Recipe: Maklain's Leggings
description: A recipe to make ascended medium leggings with Minstrel's (+Toughness, +Healing, +Concentration, and +Vitality) stats.

name: Chest of the Core Fractal Hero
description: Contains 5 Pristine Fractal Relics and 1 Golden Fractal Relic.

name: Recipe: Vigilant Exalted Pants

description: Used to craft Gossamer Leggings.

description: This item crackles with the infused energy of the Fractals of the Mists and is attuned to have a bonus agony infusion slot.

description: This champion container has champion bags, dragonite ore, and empyreal fragments.

name: Recipe: Laranthir's Grips
description: A recipe to make ascended medium gloves with Vigilant (+Power, +Toughness, +Concentration, and +Expertise) stats.

name: South Tarir Commendation
description: Defend this sector of Tarir from the octovine.

description: Used to craft Orichalcum Helms.

name: Yassith's Bastion
description: <c=@flavor>Crafted in the style of the Forgotten, Sariss Yassith.</c>

description: <c=@flavor>Crafted in the style of the Vigil leader, Laranthir of the Wild.</c>

name: Broken Caladbolg
description:
The broken remains of the storied greatsword Caladbolg.
<c=@flavor>"I don't need to understand it. I only need to do what is right."</c>
—Riannoc
